Address.Address1: Paseo de San Juan, 30, Cestona, Guipuzcoa

Description.Text: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 127 rooms. A baggage storage service, a restaurant, a dining area, a café, a conference room and a business centre are available to guests of the accommodation. Wireless internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with a bathroom. A double bed ensures a good night's sleep. Other features include internet access, a telephone and WiFi. The accommodation units include a bathroom with a shower. A hairdryer is also available. The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment A pool and an indoor pool are available to travellers. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. There are a variety of leisure options to choose from including a spa, a sauna, a steam bath, massage treatments and hydrotherapy applications. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. Guests can choose to book options such as breakfast, lunch or dinner.
